title: Final Cut Pro X 10.2.2
description:
Name: Final Cut Pro
Version: 10.2.2
Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: Pre-K'ed
OS version: OS X 10.10.4 or later
Processor type(s) & speed: 64-bit processor
Courtesy of TNT Team
Release Date: September 3, 2015
What's New in Version 10.2.2
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Native support for Sony XAVC-L and Panasonic AVC-Intra 4:4:4 up to 4K resolution
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import Canon XF-AVC 8-bit video files with Canon plug-in
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export interlaced H.264 video
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Asset management systems can include a library backup file when sharing from Final Cut Pro
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixes render errors that may occur when using reflective materials with 3D text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improves stability when swapping materials on 3D text with published parameters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improves performance when loading text styles
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Motion Title templates with published text layout parameters now export correctly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixes an issue that may cause 3D text to appear dark when rendered
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Addresses issues with timing on certain animated effects
Introduced in Version 10.2
Introducing 3D titles
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautifully animated and easily customizable 3D text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple templates to get started quickly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cinematic templates with built-in backgrounds and animations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Large collection of text styles to create stunning looks in one click
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize your titles with hundreds of combinations of materials, lighting, and edges
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional controls let you adjust environments, shadows, and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly convert any 2D title to 3D
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open any title in Motion to add multiple lights, cameras, and tracking
Advanced effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Display up to four video scopes simultaneously
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Apply super ellipse Shape mask to any clip
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Apply Draw mask to any clip, with options for linear, bezier, or B-spline smoothing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New Shape and Color mask controls for every effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly display the alpha channel for any effect mask
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Save custom effects as presets for quick access
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color Board merged into the new Color Correction effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Rearrange the processing order of Color Correction effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved keyframing with better motion smoothing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved optical flow for beautiful slow motion on a wider range of content
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Better performance of FxPlug plug-ins and built-in effects that use multiple frames like Visual Echo and Trails
Camera formats
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Panasonic AVC-Ultra codec family
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sony XAVC-S
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import Sony XAVC and XDCAM formats without separate plug-in
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ JVC H.264 Long GOP
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ GPU-accelerated RED RAW processing with support for dual GPUs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for RED RAW anamorphic formats
Additional features
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Collections can be used at the event and library level
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import window consolidates all options into single sidebar
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ GPU rendering when using Send to Compressor with support for dual GPUs
More Info: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/final-cut-pro/id424389933?mt=12
Completely redesigned from the ground up, Final Cut Pro adds extraordinary speed, quality, and flexibility to every part of the post-production workflow.
Revolutionary Video Editing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Assemble clips in the Magnetic Timeline without clip collisions or sync problems
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use Clip Connections to attach B-roll, sound effects, and music to the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reduce clutter by grouping clips into a Compound Clip.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perfect your pacing right in the timeline with the Inline Precision Editor
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cycle through different shots, graphics, or effects at one place in the timeline with Auditions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit multi-camera projects with automatic sync and support for up to 64 camera angles
Powerful Media Organization
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Organize your work within libraries for efficient media management and collaboration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Work natively with a broad range of formats including RED, AVCHD, H.264 from DSLRs, and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Content Auto-Analysis captures camera metadata and analyzes shots in the background
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and apply custom keywords on the fly as you select ranges in clips
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Collections let you dynamically organize content and find any shot in a few clicks
Incredible Performance
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Final Cut Pro uses all the GPUs in your Mac for superior real-time playback performance and fast background rendering
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 64-bit architecture uses all the RAM in your system for larger projects and richer effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Background processing lets you keep working without interruption
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ External monitoring lets you route video and audio through HDMI or third-party Thunderbolt and PCIe devices
Compelling, Customizable Effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Preview effects to see how they look with your footage before applying them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Change the look of titles, transitions, and effects using intuitive controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control effects with precision using a keyframe editor that appears directly in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use third-party FxPlug plug-ins with custom interfaces and dual-GPU support
Integrated Audio Editing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expand and edit multichannel audio files directly in the timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Let Final Cut Pro repair significant audio problems such as hum, excessive noise, and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sync DSLR video with separate audio in a single step, with instant audio waveform matching
Intuitive Color Grading
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improve the look of any clip with the single-click Balance Color feature
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Apply the Match Color feature to match the looks of two clips shot under different conditions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manipulate color, saturation, and exposure with the Color Board
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fine tune color for a specific color range or area of the screen using keying and masks
One-Step, Optimized Output
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Deliver projects for playback on Apple devices and websites such as Vimeo, YouTube, and
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use themed menus to quickly author and burn a DVD or Blu-ray disc
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export customized audio stems and multiple versions of a finished video using Roles metadata
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import and export XML to support third-party workflows
